responses.answer: TECH MEETUP 25 is a marquee AI event bringing together top technology leaders, innovators, and developers to share insights, stories, and advancements in Artificial Intelligence and software development.
The event takes place on 16 October 2025 at ETV 9, BTC, Bengaluru.

Hereâ€™s the event agenda:
- 9:00â€“10:00 AM: Breakfast
- 10:00â€“10:05 AM: Opening & Agenda Overview (Deepak Mitra)
- 10:05â€“10:10 AM: Personal Story & Journey (Naureen Fatima)
- 10:10â€“10:30 AM: Context Setting (MK Ullah)
- 10:30â€“11:30 AM: Keynote on AI (Shreevyas)
- 11:30â€“12:30 PM: Fireside Chat moderated by Samdeep Nayak with Dr. Jaiganesh, Karthikeya, Joseph Jeune, and Naveen Xavier [JPMC]
- 12:30â€“1:30 PM: Lunch
- 1:30â€“2:20 PM: TEDx-style MD Updates by Saurabh Mishra, Ganapathy Subramanian, Prashant Mekaraj, Shivaprsada Baburao, and Shyamala Popuri
- 2:20â€“2:30 PM: TEDx Summarization & Q&A (Naureen Fatima)
The event begins at 9:00 AM and concludes at 2:30 PM on 16 October 2025. Each session runs between 5 to 60 minutes as per the agenda.
The keynote session is on AI, delivered by Shreevyas from 10:30 AM to 11:30 AM.
Keynote topics include advancements in Artificial Intelligence, innovation in tech, and leadership insights.
There is no traditional panel discussion, but a Fireside Chat is scheduled featuring Dr. Jaiganesh, Karthikeya, Joseph Jeune, and Naveen Xavier [JPMC], moderated by Samdeep Nayak.
A Fireside Chat is an informal yet insightful discussion. It will be moderated by Samdeep Nayak, featuring Dr. Jaiganesh, Karthikeya, Joseph Jeune, and Naveen Xavier [JPMC].
Specialized sessions include TEDx-style MD Updates by senior leaders focusing on innovation, strategy, and technology trends.
All attendees can participate in every session as the event follows a single-track agenda.
Session recordings may be made available after the event. Please check the official communication or contact the help desk for details.
Yes, you can ask questions during sessions, especially during the Q&A/Summarization at 2:20 PM hosted by Naureen Fatima.
Questions for speakers or panelists can be submitted during sessions through the event moderators.
Featured speakers include Deepak Mitra, Naureen Fatima, MK Ullah, Shreevyas, Saurabh Mishra, and other technology leaders.

Here are some of the speaker bios:
- Avirag Gautam: AVP Software Development at Tech Corp, expert in full-stack and AI technologies.
- Deepak Mitra: Senior Technology Lead at Innovation Labs, expert in event coordination and agenda management.
- Saurabh Mishra: MD & Technology Evangelist at Future Tech, known for TEDx-style thought leadership sessions.
For event support, please contact the organizing team at avtrixx@gmail.com.
Yes, there will be an on-site help desk available at the venue for attendee assistance.
If you lose something, please report it to the event help desk at the venue for assistance.
Accessibility accommodations will be provided. Please inform the organizers in advance if you require any special assistance.
